sentence: The leading Republicans seeking the nomination for governor incumbent Brian Kemp and challenger David Perdue are far wealthier than she is.
title: Stacey Abrams' net worth over $3 million as she launches second bid for Georgia governor

sentence: Georgia Governor Brian Kemp on Tuesday signed a law allowing residents to carry handguns in public without a license or background check.
author: Adam Brewster
title: Georgia Governor Brian Kemp signs bill allowing guns to be carried without license
